text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Asyut Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Flag of Asyut Governorate.png | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = Coat of arms of Assiut Governorate.png | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = Asyut in Egypt.svg | map_caption = Asyut Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Asyut (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 4472000 | population_as_of = January 2018 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | website = | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} Asyut Governorate is one of the governorates of Egypt. The capital city is also named Asyut. It stretches across a section of the Nile River. ==Cities== The cities in the governorate are: * Abnub * Abu Tig * Asyut * Dairut * El Badari * El Ghanayem * Manfalut * El Quseyya * Sahel Selim * Sanabo * Sodfa ==References== Category:Governorates of Egypt
title: Asyut Governorate
